page.title: 12 YOUNG AND OLD
page.content:
The Youth Club -Roadwater 20 boys and girls go regularly on Tuesday evenings to the youth club in the{village hall.}There are three adults in charge. Anyone over the age of eight can go along at 6.30p.m. and play table or floor games until 8 o'clock for a subscription of 25p. In summer there are outside activities like swimming and rounders and sometimes there are barbeques on the beach. Then it is only 15p.
The Luncheon Club.-Roadwater The Roadwater Luncheon Club was formed in 1984 as a charitable group for retired men living in the{Roadwater } {area.}They meet once a month in the White Horse Inn at Hungerford for a couple of hours friendship and to listen to a guest speaker. They are similar to the Rotary Club of G.B.
